item.description:
You are invited to a Special Cocktail Reception on Saturday October 3d, 2009 at Mission Oak Grill,26 Green Street, Newburyport, MA. The event kicks off with a cocktail reception at 7 pm with complimentary appetizers and drink specials in celebration of the 3rd anniversary of Mission Oak Grill.

The celebration will feature the Flamenco Dance Project ,which is a company of artists dedicated to the evolving art of Flamenco dance and music by showcasing the talents of US-based flamenco performers. They will perform “Marcando Compas” that night.


Show starts at 8:30 pm and ticket price is $20.

Click here for event details!
item.name: Special Invite From Mission Oak Grill
